content: Umbral Abyss is one of the later-game Transformation Spells you can obtain in Black Myth: Wukong. With it, you can transform into the Macaque Chief, become immune to Frost, and wield a longsword that unleashes Frost Bane. The Focus built up before a transformation can also be converted for use afterwards.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Umbral_Abyss.md', within the main section titled 'Umbral Abyss'.
The content is as follows:
Umbral Abyss is one of the later-game Transformation Spells you can obtain in Black Myth: Wukong. With it, you can transform into the Macaque Chief, become immune to Frost, and wield a longsword that unleashes Frost Bane. The Focus built up before a transformation can also be converted for use afterwards.
